items.title: iOS 26：Apple 新游戏应用的功能介绍 (原标题: iOS 26: Here's What You Can Do With Apple's New Games App)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
# iOS 26：Apple 新游戏应用的功能介绍

在 iOS 26、iPadOS 26 和 macOS Tahoe 中，Apple 引入了一个全新的“游戏”应用，旨在成为 Apple 设备上移动游戏的中心枢纽。该应用集成了游戏发现功能和旨在提升用户参与度的附加功能。

![iOS 26 游戏应用](https://images.macrumors.com/t/vhTFDhJo2HeKSS6yBzpLrxkhfSs=/400x0/article-new/2025/08/ios-26-games-app.jpg?lossy)

“游戏”应用与 App Store 中的“游戏”标签页相似，但功能更丰富，可以看作是该标签页的全面扩展。

## 主要功能

### 1. 主页视图 (Home View)

主页标签页是“游戏”应用的主要视图，根据每个用户进行个性化定制。

*   **“继续游戏”部分**：用户可以一键快速回到上次玩过的游戏。
*   **顶部大型轮播图**：展示精选内容，如游戏推荐、朋友成就和“游戏”应用功能。

![iOS 26 游戏应用主页](https://images.macrumors.com/t/MBahKClhkuwNaqSA2rQ5kfR68EI=/400x0/article-new/2025/08/ios-26-games-app-home.jpg?lossy)

用户可以通过滑动浏览主页内容，其运作方式类似于 App Store 中的“今日”推荐。主页包含多个可滚动部分，提供内容推荐，其中一些是根据用户的游戏历史个性化定制的。不同部分包括：

*   **为你推荐的 Arcade 游戏**：包含所有 Apple Arcade 游戏推荐。
*   **朋友正在玩**：你的 Game Center 朋友最近玩过的游戏。
*   **热门游戏**：iOS 热门游戏的排名列表。
*   **因为你玩过**：基于你之前玩过的特定游戏进行的推荐。
*   **热门 Arcade 游戏**：热门 Apple Arcade 游戏的排名列表。
*   **我们喜爱的新游戏**：最近发布但非 Apple Arcade 的游戏。
*   **Apple Arcade 新游戏**：Apple Arcade 上的新游戏。
*   **先试后买**：提供试玩版的游戏。
*   **我们最期待的游戏**：可预购的即将发布的游戏。
*   **朋友推荐**：通过信息邀请他人成为 Game Center 朋友。
*   **热门免费游戏**：热门免费游戏的排名列表。
*   **热门付费游戏**：App Store 中热门付费游戏的排名列表。

### 2. 游戏活动 (Events)

Apple 早在 iOS 15 中就引入了游戏活动。现在，“游戏”应用中会显示这些活动，让用户了解哪些游戏正在提供新内容。活动可以包括限时特殊玩法、短期可用的特殊奖杯和物品、重大内容更新、联动和挑战等。

### 3. Apple Arcade 专区

应用中有一个专门的标签页用于 Apple Arcade 内容，Apple 在此推广其每月 6.99 美元的游戏服务。Apple Arcade 标签页也分为不同的部分，提供游戏推荐，与 App Store 中的 Apple Arcade 部分非常相似。

![iOS 26 游戏应用 Arcade](https://images.macrumors.com/t/Az16DlPg-k6bL-4XBj_RIsETH_w=/400x0/article-new/2025/08/ios-26-games-app-arcade.jpg?lossy)

### 4. 统一游戏库 (Unified Games Library)

“游戏”应用分为四个标签页：主页、Arcade、一起玩和资料库。资料库标签页包含用户在所有设备上玩过的所有游戏。

![iOS 26 游戏应用资料库](https://images.macrumors.com/t/-ThzX5De_T1gXF3gb9O2AQP5bgU=/400x0/article-new/2025/08/ios-26-games-app-library.jpg?lossy)

资料库允许用户在一个地方查看所有成就，按游戏分类，并可按平台筛选。此外，还有快速访问新 Apple Arcade 游戏和活动的链接。

### 5. 游戏信息 (Game Info)

点击游戏会显示上次玩的时间，并提供启动或重新下载的选项（如果游戏已被删除或在不同设备上玩过）。

![iOS 26 游戏信息](https://images.macrumors.com/t/xoo0rZKZGbROXOKZEACBwU_YCz0=/400x0/article-new/2025/08/ios-26-game-info.jpg?lossy)

所有游戏都有一个“游戏详情”部分，其中包含游戏的评级、类型、是否支持控制器以及游戏大小等清晰信息。

### 6. 一起玩 (Play Together) 标签页

在专门的“一起玩”标签页中，用户可以看到朋友正在玩的游戏列表，以及可以与他人一起玩的多人游戏推荐。此外，还有一个全新的“挑战”工具。

![iOS 26 游戏应用一起玩](https://images.macrumors.com/t/HKaD4YFW5ZRrJv5Ux9ihh7eOPAg=/400x0/article-new/2025/08/ios-26-games-app-play-together.jpg?lossy)

#### 多人游戏 (Multiplayer Games)

对于多人游戏，用户可以点击“开始多人游戏”选项，然后邀请朋友一起玩。应用会显示之前一起玩过多人游戏的朋友列表，以及可以发送给他人派对代码和邀请链接。要使用“游戏”应用中的多人游戏功能，双方玩家都需要运行 iOS 26、iPadOS 26 或 macOS 26 或更高版本。多人游戏是指与一个或多个额外玩家同时进行合作或竞技的游戏。

#### 挑战 (Challenges)

“挑战”是针对传统单人游戏的异步竞技游戏选项。通过“挑战”，用户可以选择一个游戏，设定挑战规则或参数，并与朋友竞争以获胜。挑战选项包括最快完成拼图或获得最高分。每个挑战都有时间限制，对于大多数游戏，用户可以设置一天、三天或一周的时间段。

### 7. 游戏中心 (Game Center)

“游戏”应用使得 Game Center 的功能更加突出。Game Center 长期以来一直用于获取成就和与朋友一起玩游戏，但现在它的重要性得到了提升。设置应用中仍然有 Game Center 部分，用户可以在其中邀请朋友并控制与谁分享游戏活动。当你在与朋友一起玩的游戏中获得比朋友更高的分数时，会弹出一个提示。

### 8. 游戏模式 (Game Mode)

当用户启动游戏时，游戏模式会自动激活。如果在游戏模式下进入控制中心，用户会看到一个“叠加层”选项。点击该选项，可以查看排行榜、邀请朋友玩游戏，并控制游戏设置，如音量、显示亮度以及控制器参数。

![iOS 26 游戏模式](https://images.macrumors.com/t/bIh9YXe62DmmEVumi33s4FSyby4=/400x0/article-new/2025/08/ios-26-game-mode.jpg?lossy)

通过游戏模式，用户无需离开正在玩的游戏即可访问 Game Center 设置和社交工具。游戏模式不是专注模式，它不会阻止通知或以其他方式中断设备操作。

### 9. 其他游戏应用功能

点击“游戏”应用顶部的个人资料，会弹出一个选项，可以邀请朋友加入 Game Center 并回复朋友请求，此外还可以查看挑战胜利和游戏成就。

![iOS 26 游戏应用搜索](https://images.macrumors.com/t/iMnhVfqA7Ty_z2LcfHwFNFiOlUg=/400x0/article-new/2025/08/ios-26-games-app-search.jpg?lossy)

还有一个专门的搜索按钮，用户可以输入游戏名称或点击不同的游戏类别来发现新游戏。

## 开发者支持

开发者可以创建挑战和多人活动，这些内容将显示在“游戏”应用中，从而提高游戏的可见性。

## 设备兼容性

使用新的“游戏”应用功能需要能够运行 iOS 26、iPadOS 26 或 macOS Tahoe 的设备。对于像“挑战”这样的新功能，双方用户都需要拥有最新软件的设备。“游戏”应用仅支持与其他 Apple 用户一起玩游戏，不提供与 Android 设备或其他平台用户一起玩游戏的功能。
items.shortSummary: Apple 在 iOS 26、iPadOS 26 和 macOS Tahoe 中推出了全新的“游戏”应用，旨在成为 Apple 设备的统一游戏中心。它提供个性化的主页推荐、专门的 Apple Arcade 区域、整合所有设备游戏记录的统一资料库，以及增强的社交功能，如“一起玩”标签页（支持多人游戏和异步“挑战”）。“游戏模式”允许用户在不离开游戏的情况下访问 Game Center 功能。该应用旨在简化游戏发现和社交互动，提升整体游戏体验，并要求设备运行 iOS 26 或更高版本。
items.translated_title: iOS 26：Apple 新游戏应用的功能介绍
items.content:
In iOS 26, iPadOS 26, and macOS Tahoe, Apple added an all-new Games app that's designed to be the go-to place for mobile gaming on Apple devices. The app includes features for discovering new games to play, along with add-ons meant to keep you more engaged.


The Games app is pretty similar to the Games tab in the App Store, which isn't going anywhere. It's as if Apple took the Games tab and expanded it into a full app.

Home View


The Home tab is the main view of the Games app, and it is tailored to each user. It has a "Continue Playing" section so you can get to the last game you've been playing with a tap, and there's a large carousel at the top of the interface with spotlighted content like game suggestions, friend achievements, and Games app features.


You can swipe through the content in the Home tab, and it works a lot like the Today suggestions in the ‌App Store‌. There are multiple sections to scroll through for content suggestions, some of which is personalized based on your gaming history.

Some of the different sections:

  • Arcade Games for You - Includes all Apple Arcade title suggestions.

  • Friends Are Playing - Games your Game Center friends have played recently.

  • Top Played Games - A ranked list of the most played iOS games.

  • Because You Played - Suggestions based on a specific title you previously played.

  • Top Arcade Games - A ranked list of the top ‌Apple Arcade‌ games.

  • New Games We Love - Recently released titles that aren't part of ‌Apple Arcade‌.

  • New Games on ‌Apple Arcade‌ - Includes the new titles on ‌Apple Arcade‌, but not other ‌App Store‌ titles.

  • Try Before You Buy - Games with demos you can play before you commit to a purchase.

  • Our Most Anticipated Games - Upcoming games with pre-orders available.

  • Friend Suggestions - Lets you invite people to be a Game Center friend via Messages.

  • Top Free Games - A ranked list of the top free-to-play games.

  • Top Paid Games - A ranked list of the top paid games in the ‌App Store‌.


Events


Apple introduced Events for games way back in iOS 15. Events for games are displayed in the Games app so you can see which games are offering fresh content.

Events can include limited time special gameplay, special trophies and items that are available for a short time, major content updates, crossovers, challenges, and more.

Apple Arcade


There is a dedicated tab for ‌Apple Arcade‌ content, where Apple promotes its $6.99 per month gaming service. The ‌Apple Arcade‌ tab is also broken down into different sections with gaming recommendations, much like the ‌Apple Arcade‌ section of the ‌App Store‌.


Unified Games Library


The Games app is split into four tabs, including Home, Arcade, Play Together, and Library. The Library tab includes all of the games that you have played across all of your devices.


The Library lets you see all of your achievements in one place separated by game, with filters to separate them by platform. There are also quick access links to new ‌Apple Arcade‌ titles and Events.

Game Info


Tapping into a game shows when you last played it and provides options for launching it or downloading it again if it's something that you've deleted or played on a different device.


All games have a Games Details section that includes clear information on the game's rating, type, whether there's controller support, and how large the game is.

Social Options


In the dedicated Play Together tab, you'll see a list of games that your friends are playing, along with suggestions for multiplayer games that you can play with someone else. There's also a dedicated Challenges tool, which is a new feature.


Multiplayer Games


For a multiplayer game, you can tap on the "Start Multiplayer" option and then invite someone to play with you. There's a list of friends that you've played multiplayer games with before, as well as a Party Code you can send to someone and an invite link.

Both players need to be running ‌iOS 26‌, ‌iPadOS 26‌, or macOS 26 or later to use the Multiplayer features that are in the Games app.

Multiplayer games are games where you play with one or more additional players at the same time in co-op or competitive gameplay.

Challenges


Challenges are a separate multiplayer option for asynchronous competitive gameplay for games that are traditionally single player.

With Challenges, you can select a game, choose rules or parameters for the challenge, and compete against friends to win. Challenge options range from completing a puzzle the fastest to getting the highest score. Each challenge is time limited, and for most games, you can set a time period of a day, three days, or a week.

Game Center


The Games app essentially makes Game Center features more prominent. Game Center has been around for a long time for earning achievements and playing games with friends, but it hasn't been as prominent as it is now.

There's still a Game Center section in the Settings app, where you can invite friends and control who you share your gaming activity with.

When you get a score that's higher than a friend's score in a game you're both playing, you'll see a pop up.

Game Mode


When you start a game, Game Mode is activated. If you tap into Control Center with Game Mode, you'll see an "Overlay" option. Tap that and you can see leaderboards, invite friends to play, and control game settings like sound level, display brightness, and controller parameters.


With Game Mode, you can access Game Center settings and social tools without having to leave the game that you're playing.

Game Mode is not a Focus mode and it doesn't block notifications or otherwise interrupt device operation.

Other Games App Features


Tapping on your profile at the top of the Games app brings up an option to invite friends to Game Center and respond to friend requests, plus you can see your challenge wins and your game achievements.


There's also a dedicated Search button where you can type in the name of a game or tap through different game categories to find something new to play.

For Developers


Developers can create challenges and multiplayer activities that will show up in the Games app for improved game visibility.

Device Compatibility


Using the new Games app features requires a device that is able to run ‌iOS 26‌, ‌iPadOS 26‌, or macOS Tahoe. For the new Games app features like Challenges, both users need to have a device with the latest software.

The Games app is for gameplay with other Apple users, and there's no functionality for playing games with people who have Android devices or use other platforms.

Read More


We have a complete iOS 26 roundup that covers all of the new features that are available in the update.
Related Roundups: iOS 26, iPadOS 26

items.title: Apple Watch Series 11 下月发布，将带来这些新功能 (原标题: Apple Watch Series 11 Launching Next Month With These New Features)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
# Apple Watch Series 11 新功能预览

Apple Watch Series 11 机型预计将于下个月（即2025年9月）的苹果发布会上亮相。继去年显示屏升级之后，今年的重点可能在于引入新的健康功能。以下是目前关于 Apple Watch Series 11 的主要传闻汇总：

## 核心硬件升级

*   **更快的芯片 (S11)**
    *   苹果有望推出更新的 S11 芯片，采用更紧凑、高效的设计。
    *   预计处理器性能将得到提升，从而延长整体电池续航时间。
    *   内部空间可能增加，为更大容量的电池或其他内部组件提供可能。

*   **更新的调制解调器芯片**
    *   Apple Watch Series 11 机型可能会采用联发科（MediaTek）的新型调制解调器，支持 5G RedCap。
    *   5G RedCap 是一种专为可穿戴设备设计的 5G 服务，无需标准 5G 速度。
    *   目前 Apple Watch 仅限于 LTE 速度，5G RedCap 有望带来连接性改进。

## 健康功能展望

*   **血压警报**
    *   苹果正在开发一项血压监测功能，但目前尚不确定是否能在 2025 年的机型中推出，此前曾遇到准确性和可靠性方面的开发问题。
    *   如果该功能推出，它不会像标准血压计那样提供精确的收缩压和舒张压测量值。
    *   相反，它将监测高血压状况，并在长时间检测到高血压时通知 Apple Watch 用户。
    *   高血压是心脏病、中风及其他健康问题的风险因素。
    *   用户收到高血压通知后，可将信息提供给医疗专业人员进行进一步检查，类似于现有房颤检测功能的预警作用。

*   **睡眠评分**
    *   在 iOS 26 代码中发现了苹果正在为 Apple Watch 开发睡眠评分功能的迹象。
    *   该功能可能会根据用户前一晚的睡眠量，预测其白天的功能表现。
    *   许多健康追踪设备都提供睡眠评分，但 Apple Watch 尚未提供此功能（目前仅追踪 REM、核心和深度睡眠，以及在床时间和清醒时间）。
    *   睡眠评分可能会结合多项健康指标，例如 watchOS 11 中引入的“生命体征”选项。
    *   目前 watchOS 26 中没有睡眠评分功能的迹象，因此它可能是 2025 年 Apple Watch 机型独有的功能。
    *   ![ios 26 watch sleep score](https://images.macrumors.com/t/zpnZzMzEI4StCVh245qiV7rhiBA=/400x0/article-new/2025/07/ios-26-watch-sleep-score.jpg?lossy)

*   **血氧监测**
    *   血氧监测功能在美国销售的 Apple Watch 机型上仍然不可用。
    *   目前没有迹象表明该功能会随 Apple Watch Series 11 回归。

## watchOS 26 新特性

Apple Watch Series 11 将运行 watchOS 26，苹果目前正在对其进行 Beta 测试。

*   **Workout Buddy (锻炼伙伴)**
    *   一项全新的功能，旨在激励用户进行锻炼。
    *   需要配对支持 Apple Intelligence 的 iPhone。
    *   使用基于真实 Apple Fitness+ 训练师语音数据创建的文本转语音生成式 AI 模型。
    *   Workout Buddy 听起来像一位真正的私人教练，可以鼓励用户完成锻炼并达到健身目标。
    *   ![watchos 26](https://images.macrumors.com/t/B29c0sWtUybHUEbO4cQzgj0RI-s=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/watchos-26.jpg?lossy)
    *   ![watchos 26 gradient light](https://images.macrumors.com/t/PdPI2HyP2r-A7AFSK0iodr7TIGQ=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/watchos-26-gradient-light.jpg?lossy)

*   **Liquid Glass 重新设计**
    *   与 iOS 26 的 Liquid Glass 外观相匹配。

*   **其他改进**
    *   更新的智能叠放 (Smart Stack)。
    *   重新设计的控制中心 (Control Center)。
    *   新的手势等。

## 10 周年纪念

2025 年恰逢 Apple Watch 推出 10 周年。此前有传闻称苹果可能会推出一款特别的周年纪念版 Apple Watch，进行重大设计改造，包括新的磁性表带连接系统和更薄的外壳。虽然 Series 10 引入了更纤薄的 Apple Watch，但传闻中的表带连接系统并未出现。Series 11 预计在表带方面不会有新变化，但苹果可能会以某种方式纪念这一周年。
items.shortSummary: Apple Watch Series 11 预计将于下月（9月）发布，重点是健康功能。它可能搭载更快的S11芯片和支持5G RedCap的新调制解调器。主要新功能包括潜在的血压警报（监测高血压而非精确测量）、watchOS 26带来的“Workout Buddy”AI教练、Liquid Glass设计更新，以及iOS 26代码中暗示的睡眠评分功能。血氧监测在美国市场仍不可用。2025年是Apple Watch十周年，但预计设计无重大改变。
items.translated_title: Apple Watch Series 11 下月发布，将带来这些新功能
items.content:
There's just about a month to go until Apple unveils the Apple Watch Series 11 models at its September event. Last year we got display upgrades, and this year, there could be new health features. We've recapped all of the current Apple Watch Series 11 rumors for a quick preview of what might be coming.


Faster Chip


Apple is likely planning to introduce an updated S11 chip that offers a more compact, efficient design. We could see improvements in processor performance to increase overall battery life, along with additional space for a bigger battery or other internal components.

Updated Modem Chip


The Apple Watch Series 11 models could adopt new modems from MediaTek with 5G RedCap support. 5G RedCap is a 5G service that's designed for wearables that don't need standard 5G speeds.

Right now, the Apple Watch models are limited to LTE speeds, but 5G RedCap could bring connectivity improvements.

Blood Pressure Alerts


Apple is working on a blood pressure monitoring feature, though it continues to be unclear if it will be ready for launch in the 2025 models. Apple ran into development issues with accuracy and reliability that could push the feature back, but we haven't heard anything lately and it's possible Apple was able to fix the problems.

If we do get blood pressure monitoring for the Apple Watch, it's not going to provide exact systolic and diastolic measurements like a standard blood pressure cuff or monitoring device.

Instead, it will monitor for hypertension and will notify Apple Watch users if the condition is detected over time. Hypertension is a health issue where blood pressure stays high over time, and it is a risk factor for heart disease, stroke, and other health problems.

An Apple Watch user who is notified about hypertension will be able to provide that information to a medical professional for additional testing, similar to how the existing features for detecting atrial fibrillation can be used as an early warning system.

watchOS 26 Features


The Apple Watch Series 11 will run watchOS 26, which Apple is beta testing now. ‌watchOS 26‌ includes an all-new Workout Buddy that is designed to motivate you during workouts.


Workout Buddy relies on a paired iPhone that supports Apple Intelligence, and it uses a text-to-speech generative AI model created using voice data from real Apple Fitness+ trainers. Workout Buddy sounds like a real personal trainer that can encourage you to get through your workout and meet your fitness goals.

‌watchOS 26‌ also includes a Liquid Glass redesign that matches the Liquid Glass look of iOS 26, plus it has an updated Smart Stack, a revamped Control Center, new gestures, and more.

A full list of what's new in ‌watchOS 26‌ can be found in our watchOS 26 roundup.

Sleep Score


In ‌iOS 26‌ code, we found signs that suggest Apple is working on a sleep score feature for the Apple Watch.


Little is known about Apple's work on the option right now, but Apple could perhaps provide a sleep-related score that will predict how well you'll be able to function during the day based on the amount of sleep that you got the night before.

Many health tracking devices offer a sleep score, but it's something that Apple has not provided with the Apple Watch yet. The Apple Watch has sleep tracking and separates sleep into REM, Core, and Deep, plus Apple provides time in bed and time awake metrics.

The sleep score could take into account multiple health metrics, like the Vitals option that came in watchOS 11.

There is no sign of the sleep score feature in ‌watchOS 26‌, so it's possible that it's something that will be exclusive to the 2025 Apple Watch models.

Apple Watch Anniversary


2025 actually marks the 10th anniversary of the Apple Watch. There were rumors that Apple could debut a special anniversary edition of the Apple Watch with a major design overhaul that included a new magnetic band attachment system and a thinner casing.

With the Series 10, Apple introduced a slimmed down Apple Watch, but there was no sign of the rumored band attachment system.

We're still not expecting anything new with bands in the Series 11, but Apple could acknowledge the anniversary in some way.

Blood Oxygen Monitoring


Blood oxygen monitoring remains unavailable on Apple Watch models sold in the United States, and there are no signs that the feature will return with the Apple Watch Series 11.

items.title: ChatGPT Plus 用户在对 GPT-5 抱怨后仍可继续使用 GPT-4o (原标题: ChatGPT Plus Users Can Keep Using GPT-4o After Complaints About GPT-5)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
## OpenAI 回应 GPT-5 抱怨：Plus 用户可继续使用 GPT-4o

OpenAI 首席执行官 Sam Altman 于 2025 年 8 月 8 日宣布，鉴于用户对新发布的 GPT-5 模型存在诸多抱怨，公司将允许 ChatGPT Plus 用户继续使用上一代 GPT-4o 模型。

![chatgpt logo](https://images.macrumors.com/t/xLV5YrgxwKQo4rlugNdNblGLLzU=/400x0/article-new/2025/04/chatgpt-logo.jpg?lossy)

### 用户抱怨的主要原因：

*   **未经警告的替换：** OpenAI 在未发出警告的情况下，用 GPT-5 替换了之前的 ChatGPT 模型，引发用户不满。
*   **模型表现差异：**
    *   部分用户已习惯 GPT-4o 的语气和风格，认为 GPT-5 无法复制。
    *   Reddit 上有大量抱怨称 GPT-5 相比 GPT-4o 缺乏个性，且无法完成相同的任务。
    *   用户还抱怨 GPT-5 的回复过短，并且很快达到使用限制。
*   **初期性能问题：** Altman 承认，由于“自动切换器”问题，GPT-5 在发布初期显得“笨得多”。

### OpenAI 的应对措施与未来计划：

1.  **允许回退：** Plus 用户现在可以选择继续使用 GPT-4o 模型。
2.  **使用限制提升：** 随着 GPT-5 的全面部署完成，ChatGPT Plus 用户的 GPT-5 使用限制将翻倍。
3.  **旧模型支持：** OpenAI 将观察用户对旧模型的使用情况，并考虑对旧模型的持续支持时间。
4.  **模型智能提升：** Altman 表示，未来 GPT-5 应该会更智能，并已解决了导致其初期表现不佳的“自动切换器”问题。
5.  **用户界面改进：**
    *   OpenAI 计划更清晰地显示当前正在回答查询的模型。
    *   将更新用户界面，使其更容易手动触发模型的“思考”过程。
6.  **持续听取反馈：** OpenAI 将继续听取用户反馈。

### 部署现状与 Siri 集成：

*   GPT-5 的全面部署比预期要慢，部分用户尚未看到 GPT-5 作为选项。
*   从 iOS 26 开始，集成到 Siri 中的 ChatGPT 功能将使用 GPT-5 模型；在此之前，仍将使用旧版 ChatGPT 模型。
items.shortSummary: OpenAI 首席执行官 Sam Altman 宣布，为回应用户对 GPT-5 的抱怨，ChatGPT Plus 用户可选择继续使用 GPT-4o。用户抱怨 GPT-5 替换无预警、风格差异、回复过短及使用限制。OpenAI 将观察旧模型使用情况，并计划将 GPT-5 使用限制翻倍，改进 UI 以清晰显示模型，并解决初期“变笨”问题。从 iOS 26 开始，Siri 将集成 GPT-5。
items.translated_title: ChatGPT Plus 用户在对 GPT-5 抱怨后仍可继续使用 GPT-4o
items.content:
OpenAI CEO Sam Altman today said that the company will allow Plus users to continue to use the prior-generation GPT-4o model if they don't want to use the new GPT-5 model that came out yesterday.


As noted by The Wall Street Journal's Joanna Stern, there were some ChatGPT users who were upset that OpenAI replaced prior ChatGPT models with GPT-5 with no warning. Some people had become accustomed to the tone and feel of GPT-4o, and did not feel that the GPT-5 model was able to replicate it.

There are multiple complaints on Reddit about GPT-5's lack of personality compared to GPT-4o, and from people who feel that GPT-5 isn't able to complete the same tasks. Users have also complained about GPT-5 offering replies that are too short, and about hitting usage limits too quickly.

Altman says that Plus users can choose to continue to use 4o, and that OpenAI will watch usage and consider how long legacy models should continue to be supported.

To address the other complaints, GPT-5 rate limits for ChatGPT Plus users will be doubled as the GPT-5 rollout is completed. It is taking longer than expected for OpenAI to deploy GPT-5 to all users, and some people are not yet seeing GPT-5 as an option.

Going forward, GPT-5 should seem smarter, Altman said. There was apparently an issue with the autoswitcher yesterday that caused GPT-5 to seem "way dumber." OpenAI also plans to make it more clear about which model is answering a query, and will update the UI to make it easier to manually trigger thinking. Altman says that OpenAI will continue to listen to user feedback going forward.

Starting with iOS 26, the ChatGPT feature that's integrated into Siri will use the GPT-5 model. Until then, it will continue to use the prior ChatGPT models.
Tag: OpenAI

items.title: iOS 26: 7项AirPods新功能 (原标题: iOS 26: 7 New AirPods Features)
items.creator: Juli Clover
items.summary:
# iOS 26: 7项AirPods新功能

随着iOS 26的发布，Apple为AirPods带来了多项新功能，使其比以往任何时候都更加实用。这些新增功能将于今年秋季随iOS 26和更新的AirPods固件一同推出，但用户现在即可进行测试。

![airpods pro 2 pinnk](https://images.macrumors.com/t/6d_sNm8vOqw3vomjqdX0C38VRVs=/400x0/article-new/2025/05/airpods-pro-2-pinnk.jpeg?lossy)

## 主要新功能

1.  **相机遥控器**
    *   AirPods现在可用作相机应用的遥控器，包括Apple自带相机应用和第三方iOS相机应用。
    *   启用方式：连接AirPods到iPhone，进入“设置”应用中的AirPods部分，选择“相机遥控器”选项。
    *   使用方法：戴上AirPods，打开相机应用，按住AirPods柄即可拍照或开始录像；再次按住可停止录像。
    *   优势：相比Apple Watch，AirPods提供更快捷的物理手势操作。

2.  **录音室级音质录制**
    *   AirPods 4和AirPods Pro 2现支持录音室级音质录制，适用于采访、播客、歌曲、视频等。
    *   借助“语音突显”功能，可在移动中录制高质量人声，并有效过滤背景噪音。
    *   此功能在iPhone、iPad和Mac上均可用，并支持相机应用、语音备忘录、信息听写、第三方相机应用和视频会议应用。

3.  **通话质量提升**
    *   AirPods 4和AirPods Pro 2中的H2芯片为iPhone通话、FaceTime通话以及所有支持CallKit的应用程序（如Zoom）带来更自然的语音质感和清晰度。
    *   此功能同样适用于iPhone、iPad和Mac。

4.  **睡眠时暂停音频**
    *   新增“睡眠时暂停媒体”选项，当用户在睡前佩戴AirPods听音乐、播客或有声书时，AirPods会在用户入睡后自动暂停音频。
    *   可在AirPods设置中找到此选项（需新固件和iOS 26）。
    *   作用：不仅能保留有声书或播客的播放进度，还能通过关闭AirPods来节省电池。
    *   此功能也适用于Beats耳机。

5.  **保持音频在耳机中**
    *   解决了CarPlay和AirPods之间音频切换的常见问题。
    *   新增“保持音频在耳机中”选项，可防止音频在用户通过AirPods听音乐时切换到车载扬声器或蓝牙扬声器。
    *   启用后，即使进入汽车，音乐也会继续在AirPods中播放。
    *   可在“设置”>“通用”>“隔空播放与接力”中开启。

6.  **充电提醒**
    *   iOS 26改进了AirPods的充电功能，充电盒将更清晰地显示充电状态。
    *   当AirPods电量低时，会收到充电提醒。
    *   指示灯状态：绿色表示充满电，琥珀色闪烁表示正在充电，深琥珀色表示电量低需充电。

7.  **测试版更新**
    *   iOS 26新增了更便捷地为AirPods安装测试版更新的选项。
    *   连接AirPods到iPhone并在“设置”应用中点击AirPods，会看到新的更新界面。

## 如何立即体验新功能

要体验iOS 26的AirPods新功能，您需要安装iOS 26公共测试版或开发者测试版。安装iOS 26后，连接AirPods，进入“设置”应用中的AirPods部分，向下滚动找到“AirPods测试版更新”并开启测试版固件。将AirPods放入充电盒并靠近iPhone，即可触发测试版固件下载。一旦AirPods运行测试版固件，新功能的设置选项将出现在AirPods设置中。
items.shortSummary: iOS 26为AirPods带来了7项新功能，显著提升了其实用性。主要更新包括：将AirPods用作相机遥控器、提供录音室级音质录制、改善通话质量、新增睡眠时自动暂停音频功能、解决CarPlay音频切换问题、优化充电状态提醒，以及简化AirPods测试版固件更新流程。这些功能将于今年秋季正式推出，但用户可通过安装iOS 26测试版提前体验。
items.content:
With iOS 26, Apple is bringing several new features to the AirPods, making them more useful than before. The added functionality will be available this fall when Apple releases ‌iOS 26‌ and updated AirPods firmware, but you can test everything new right now.


Camera Remote


The AirPods can be used as a camera remote for the Camera app or third-party iOS camera apps. You'll need to enable the feature if you want to use it, and you can do so by connecting your AirPods to your iPhone, opening up the AirPods section in the Settings app, and then choosing the Camera Remote option.

Once the feature is turned on, using it is as simple as popping in your AirPods, opening the camera app, and then pressing and holding on the AirPods stem to take a photo or start a video recording.

When you're finished, a second press and hold gesture will stop the recording. If you have an Apple Watch, you can already control your ‌iPhone‌ remotely from your wrist, but the AirPods have the potential to be even quicker since it's a one-press physical gesture rather than a series of steps that include opening an Apple Watch app.

Studio-Quality Recording


The AirPods 4 and the AirPods Pro 2 now offer recording studio-quality audio for interviews, podcasts, songs, videos, and more. Apple says that the feature can be used to record high-quality vocals while on the go, with background sounds filtered out thanks to Voice Isolation.

You can record higher-quality audio when making videos or using your devices to do things like record a podcast.

Improved Call Quality


The H2 chip in the ‌AirPods 4‌ and ‌AirPods Pro‌ 2 brings more natural vocal texture and clarity to ‌iPhone‌ calls, FaceTime calls, and all CallKit-enabled apps like Zoom.

Studio-quality audio recording and improved call quality are available across ‌iPhone‌, iPad, and Mac, and support the Camera app, Voice Memos, Messages dictation, third-party camera apps, and video conferencing apps.

Pause Audio for Sleep


If you're listening to music, a podcast, or a book while you're in bed and you're wearing AirPods, the AirPods will pause your audio when you fall asleep if you toggle on the new "Pause Media When Falling Asleep" option.

You'll find it in the AirPods settings after connecting your AirPods to your ‌iPhone‌, but you'll need the new AirPods firmware and ‌iOS 26‌. In addition to saving your spot in an audiobook or podcast, it will also preserve battery by turning your AirPods off so they're not running all night.

This feature also works with Beats earbuds.

Keep Audio in Headphones


‌iOS 26‌ addresses an irritating issue that happens with CarPlay and AirPods. There's a "Keep Audio in Headphones" option that prevents audio from switching to car speakers or Bluetooth speakers when you're listening to music through the AirPods.

With the option on, your music will continue playing in your AirPods when you get in the car. You can turn it on in ‌iOS 26‌ by going to Settings > General > AirPlay and Continuity.

Charging Reminders


Apple improved AirPods charging in ‌iOS 26‌, and the AirPods Charging case will now more clearly indicate charging status. You'll also see reminders when it's time to charge your AirPods so you're less likely to run out of battery.

There's a green light when the AirPods are fully charged, a pulsing amber light when they're charging, and a darker amber light that lets you know that it's time for a charge because the battery is getting low.

Beta Updates


With ‌iOS 26‌, Apple is adding an option to more easily install beta updates on AirPods. There's a new update interface when you connect your AirPods to your ‌iPhone‌ and tap into them in the Settings app.

How to Get the New AirPods Features Now


To try out the new ‌iOS 26‌ AirPods features, you'll need to install the ‌iOS 26‌ public beta or the ‌iOS 26‌ developer beta. The developer beta requires a free developer account, but anyone can sign up for the ‌iOS 26‌ public beta.

Just go to Apple's beta website and follow the steps.

Once you have ‌iOS 26‌ installed, you can connect your AirPods and then open up the AirPods section of the Settings app. From there, scroll down to AirPods Beta Updates and toggle on beta firmware.

Put the AirPods in the charging case and put them near your ‌iPhone‌ to trigger the beta firmware to be downloaded on the AirPods. Once your AirPods are running the beta firmware, you'll see settings for the new options in the AirPods section of the Settings app.

Read More


We have a dedicated iOS 26 roundup that goes into detail on all of the new features that are available in the update.

items.title: 跳过iPhone 17 Pro？以下是迄今为止关于iPhone 18 Pro的关键传闻 (原标题: Skipping the iPhone 17 Pro? Here Are Key iPhone 18 Pro Rumors So Far)
items.creator: Joe Rossignol
items.summary:
# iPhone 18 Pro 关键传闻

尽管iPhone 18 Pro和iPhone 18 Pro Max距离发布还有一年时间，但关于这些设备的一些早期传闻已经浮出水面。

![iphone 16 pro ghost hand](https://images.macrumors.com/t/VpzHcNYVqHZm_CazsJsQK2bbrIE=/400x0/article-new/2023/11/iphone-16-pro-ghost-hand.jpg?lossy)

以下是迄今为止关于iPhone 18 Pro的一些关键传闻：

## 屏下Face ID

*   **时间线变化：** 显示行业分析师Ross Young在2023年4月曾表示，iPhone 17 Pro型号将采用屏下Face ID。然而，在2024年5月，Young表示他听说这一变化已推迟到2026年。如果属实，这意味着屏下Face ID可能会在明年的iPhone 18 Pro和iPhone 18 Pro Max上首次亮相。
*   **设计影响：** 由于采用屏下Face ID，Young认为iPhone 18 Pro型号的灵动岛（Dynamic Island）将会更小。
*   **其他消息来源：** 2024年5月，《The Information》也报道称，iPhone 18 Pro型号很可能配备屏下Face ID。

![face id](https://images.macrumors.com/t/BNGoDLe2DAHe19A1SAugrWo3YIE=/400x0/article-new/2024/09/face-id.jpg?lossy)

## 可变光圈

*   **主摄像头特性：** 据分析师郭明錤（Ming-Chi Kuo）称，iPhone 18 Pro两款型号的主4800万像素Fusion摄像头将提供可变光圈功能。
*   **功能优势：** 可变光圈允许用户控制通过摄像头镜头到达传感器的光量。
*   **与现有对比：** 目前iPhone 14 Pro、iPhone 15 Pro和iPhone 16 Pro型号的主摄像头光圈固定为ƒ/1.78，镜头始终完全打开并以最宽光圈拍摄。
*   **用户控制：** 根据这一传闻，iPhone 18 Pro型号将允许用户手动更改光圈。
*   **景深控制：** iPhone 18 Pro型号上的可变光圈应能让用户更好地控制景深，即前景主体与背景的清晰度对比。
*   **潜在限制：** 考虑到iPhone由于尺寸限制而拥有较小的图像传感器，目前尚不清楚这项改进的实际意义有多大。

![iphone 16 pro design cameras](https://images.macrumors.com/t/Pe5TPbnSdC3pVPr2sz_VJZFx9q0=/400x0/article-new/2023/11/iphone-16-pro-design-cameras.jpg?lossy)

## 三星图像传感器

*   **新传感器：** 据DigiTimes报道，三星正在开发一种新的三层堆叠图像传感器，苹果有望将其用于iPhone 18 Pro型号的至少一个摄像头。
*   **性能提升：** 这种先进的图像传感器将使摄像头响应更灵敏，并带来其他好处，如照片降噪、动态范围增加等。
*   **供货时间：** 2024年7月，郭明錤表示，他预计三星最早将于2026年（即iPhone 18 Pro型号预计发布的时间）开始向苹果供应4800万像素超广角摄像头传感器。
*   **制造地点：** 本周《金融时报》报道称，三星将在德克萨斯州生产这些图像传感器。
*   **供应商变化：** 目前，所有iPhone图像传感器均由索尼供应。

![iphone 12 pro max sensor shift](https://images.macrumors.com/t/grBH90bI-k_hpWDUVKy5rf8eExg=/400x0/article-new/2020/11/iphone-12-pro-max-sensor-shift.jpg?lossy)

## 其他传闻

*   iPhone 18 Pro型号预计将搭载A20 Pro芯片（2纳米工艺）。
*   将配备苹果定制的C2调制解调器。
items.shortSummary: iPhone 18 Pro/Pro Max的早期传闻包括：屏下Face ID的引入，这将使灵动岛缩小。主摄像头有望支持可变光圈，提供更好的景深控制。此外，新机型预计将采用三星开发的三层堆叠图像传感器，提升拍照性能。其他传闻还包括搭载2纳米A20 Pro芯片和苹果定制的C2调制解调器。
items.translated_title: 跳过iPhone 17 Pro？以下是迄今为止关于iPhone 18 Pro的关键传闻
items.content:
While the iPhone 18 Pro and iPhone 18 Pro Max are still a year away, there are already several early rumors about the devices.


Below, we recap some key iPhone 18 Pro rumors.

Under-Screen Face ID



In April 2023, display industry analyst Ross Young shared a roadmap showing that iPhone 17 Pro models would feature under-display Face ID. In May 2024, however, Young said he heard this change had been delayed until 2026. If so, that means that under-screen Face ID could debut on the iPhone 18 Pro and iPhone 18 Pro Max next year.

As a result of the under-screen Face ID, Young believes that the iPhone 18 Pro models will have a smaller Dynamic Island.

In May, The Information also reported that the iPhone 18 Pro models would likely be equipped with under-screen Face ID.

Variable Aperture



The main 48-megapixel Fusion camera on both iPhone 18 Pro models will offer variable aperture, according to analyst Ming-Chi Kuo.

With variable aperture, users would be able to control the amount of light that passes through the camera's lens and reaches the sensor. The main cameras on iPhone 14 Pro, iPhone 15 Pro, and iPhone 16 Pro models have a fixed aperture of ƒ/1.78, and the lens is always fully open and shooting with this widest aperture. With the iPhone 18 Pro models, users would be able to manually change the aperture, according to this rumor.

A variable aperture on iPhone 18 Pro models should provide users with greater control over depth of field, which refers to how sharp a subject appears in the foreground compared to the background. However, given that iPhones have smaller image sensors due to size constraints, it is unclear exactly how meaningful this improvement would be.

Samsung Image Sensor



Samsung is developing a new three-layer stacked image sensor that Apple is expected to use for at least one camera on the iPhone 18 Pro models, according to DigiTimes. This advanced image sensor would make the camera more responsive, and offer other benefits like reduced noise in photos, increased dynamic range, and more.

In July 2024, Kuo said he expected Samsung to begin shipping 48-megapixel Ultra Wide camera sensors to Apple for iPhones as early as 2026, which is when the iPhone 18 Pro models are expected to be released.

Just this week, the Financial Times said Samsung will manufacture the image sensors in Texas.

Currently, all iPhone image sensors are supplied by Sony.

Other Rumors


iPhone 18 Pro models are expected to have an A20 Pro chip (2nm) and Apple's custom C2 modem.
